gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 109, Lakers 90
gameRecap.excerpt: Indiana defeats Los Angeles, 109-90. For Indiana, Pascal Siakam led the way with 22 points, 11 rebounds, six assists while aided by Tyrese Haliburton (21 points, eight rebounds, eight assists) in the victory. Anthony Davis finished with 24 points and 15 rebounds with LeBron James adding 16 points, 10 rebounds, and eight assists for Los Angeles in the losing effort. Indiana improves to 42-33, while Los Angeles moves to 41-33 in the loss.
